meanings.definition: Relating to or occurring in an exon.
meanings.sent1: The exonic region of the gene contains important information.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the exonic sequences to understand genetic coding.
meanings.sent3: The exonic part of the gene decided to throw a party for the other genetic components.
meanings.sent4: Her exonic knowledge shone brightly among her peers.
meanings.sent5: The exonic characteristics of the gene were like colorful puzzle pieces fitting perfectly together.
